April 8: Introduction to the course: Lecture and behavioral economics experiment; Philosophical background 1: utilitarian theory

NOTE: All classes face-to-face.

第4回: April 20: Philosophical background 4: Kantian thinking and the social contract approach
Read excerpts from "Why political problems are not all economic" and "The idea of the social contract"
第5回: April 22: The stockholder and stakeholder approaches to business
第7回: Find two examples in the Japanese press to discuss, complete Assignment #4

第10回: May 10: Movie, as preparation for class on moral psychology
第11回: Read excerpt from, "The war for kindness"
